unit.utterance: maumwi gabaw gaw num kaja num n kaja lu ai la langai mi a lam
unit.utterance_translation: The title of this story is a story of a man who got a bad wife.

unit.utterance: kalang mi na hta dai mare langai mi ndai kaw gaida hkan nu ni nga ai
unit.utterance_translation: Once upon a time, there lived a widow and her two children there, in a village.

unit.utterance: gaida hkan nu i la kasha lahkawng magam manaw hte kanu hte re nga ai
unit.utterance_translation: A widow and her two children, OK?, two male children, the first-born son, the second-born son, and their mother lived there.

unit.utterance: shan nu ni gaw yi sha galaw sha na nga ai re
unit.utterance_translation: They two and their mother earned their living by cultivating a slash-and-burn field and (they) lived.

unit.utterance: lani mi hta ndai kanu gaw grai machyi kaba hkrum na she
unit.utterance_translation: One day, the mother got very sick and

unit.utterance: shi gaw dai hku n nga mat na
unit.utterance_translation: She passed away like this and

unit.utterance: grau na madung mat ai le i
unit.utterance_translation: She faced death, OK?

unit.utterance: si wa na zawn zawn byin taw ai rai na she
unit.utterance_translation: she was dying and

unit.utterance: kanu gaw shi hkum shi chye majaw
unit.utterance_translation: because the mother knew about her body

unit.utterance: kasha yen hkawng hpe shaga di na she
unit.utterance_translation: (she) called her two children and

unit.utterance: hkai li tum hkai li tum masum dai hpai na she
unit.utterance_translation: she took three seeds and

unit.utterance: shi na kasha magam wa hpe jaw ai
unit.utterance_translation: (she) gave (them) to the first-born son.

unit.utterance: nan nau lahkawng nang da nang kahpu re majaw
unit.utterance_translation: "You two...you, because you are the elder brother,

unit.utterance: kanau hpe grai tsawra na
unit.utterance_translation: love your younger brother very much and

unit.utterance: atsawm rai bau maka u yaw
unit.utterance_translation: take care of (him)."

unit.utterance: anu n nga mat ai hpang
unit.utterance_translation: "After I am dead

unit.utterance: rai na nang ndai hkai li hpe hkai tawn da u
unit.utterance_translation: then plant these seeds."

unit.utterance: rai na hkai li ndai kaba wa jang asi si na ra ai
unit.utterance_translation: "Then, these seeds will grow and bear fruits."

unit.utterance: dai yang ndai asi si ai dai hpe lani mi langai langai sha di u yaw
unit.utterance_translation: "Then, pick only a fruit a day."

unit.utterance: law law hkum di yaw
unit.utterance_translation: "Don't pick many of them."

unit.utterance: law law n mai di ai
unit.utterance_translation: "You should not pick many of them."

unit.utterance: lani mi langai langai sha di na
unit.utterance_translation: (She) said "Pick only a fruit a day and

unit.utterance: nan nau lahkawng dai hku shada da tsawra hkat ai hte
unit.utterance_translation: you brothers love each other and

unit.utterance: grai pyaw hkra nga mu yaw nga na tsun na
unit.utterance_translation: live very happily" and

unit.utterance: dai hku numhtet ga ga tsun na she
unit.utterance_translation: (she) gave (him) an order like this and

unit.utterance: kade n na yang kanu n nga mat ai
unit.utterance_translation: before long, the mother passed away.

unit.utterance: kanu n nga mat ai rai na she
unit.utterance_translation: The mother passed away and

unit.utterance: kaja wa sha shan nau lahkawng mung grai tsawra hkat ai
unit.utterance_translation: really they two loved each other.

unit.utterance: kahpu mung kanau hpe grai tsawra kanau mung kahpu hpe grai tsawra na she
unit.utterance_translation: The elder brother loved the younger brother, the young brother loved the elder brother and

unit.utterance: asak aprat kaba wa sai hte maren
unit.utterance_translation: at the time when the elder brother grew up

unit.utterance: dai magam gaw num la sai
unit.utterance_translation: the first-born son got a wife.

unit.utterance: num la na she nga rai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (He) got a wife and (they) lived and

unit.utterance: dai shan nau hkai da ai hpun dai mung kaba wa sai
unit.utterance_translation: the tree they planted also became big.

unit.utterance: kaba wa na she
unit.utterance_translation: (It) became big and

unit.utterance: num la ai kade n na yang dai kaw
unit.utterance_translation: It was not long after he got a wife, there

unit.utterance: dai hpun dai wa si si wa sai
unit.utterance_translation: the tree bore fruits.

unit.utterance: hpun dai wa si si wa rai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: The tree bore fruits and

unit.utterance: dai hpun dai wa lani mi lani mi dai hku ja si si wa ai da
unit.utterance_translation: the tree bore golden fruits like that day by day, it's said.

unit.utterance: dai wa she mai dut sha ai i
unit.utterance_translation: They can live by selling them, OK?

unit.utterance: grai manu dan ai asi rai taw nga yang she
unit.utterance_translation: They were valuable fruits and

unit.utterance: dai num gaw shi na karat shi gaw myit ai
unit.utterance_translation: the wife thought.

unit.utterance: ya lamana ndai kaw sha nga taw yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: If (the brother-in-law) continues to live here

unit.utterance: ngai na arat manaw mung num bai la rai jang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: my brother-in-law will also get a wife and

unit.utterance: dai hpe mung bai jaw ra ai
unit.utterance_translation: (we) have to give it (the golden fruit to her).

unit.utterance: shan hkawng ma bai lu
unit.utterance_translation: The two will get a child.

unit.utterance: rai yang gaw ndai gaw an hkawng hkrai bai n lu
unit.utterance_translation: Then, we two will not get it.

unit.utterance: rai yang she shi gaw dai hpe myit rai na she
unit.utterance_translation: Then, she thought about it and

unit.utterance: shi gaw shi madu wa hpe gara hku di ra na i ngu na she
unit.utterance_translation: she said to her husband "how should we treat it" and

unit.utterance: shi gaw garat manaw hpe grai n ra taw sai
unit.utterance_translation: she did not like her brother-in-law very much.

unit.utterance: grai n ra taw nga ai
unit.utterance_translation: She did not like him very much.

unit.utterance: nta kaw na gawt kau gawt kau mayu ai re
unit.utterance_translation: (She) wanted to drive him away from the house.

unit.utterance: raitim bai n mai rai yang
unit.utterance_translation: But, it was not possible and

unit.utterance: gawt kau gaw n mai rai yang
unit.utterance_translation: Driving him away was not possible and

unit.utterance: shi gaw jang madu wa hpe bawng ai
unit.utterance_translation: she consulted her husband.

unit.utterance: shi gaw shi madu wa hpe
unit.utterance_translation: She said to her husband

unit.utterance: nwa an hkawng i ndai hpun kaw si ai ndai si yawng hkra hpe di la na
unit.utterance_translation: "Husband, let's us two pick all these fruits from this tree and

unit.utterance: mare kaba de sa mat ga ngu dai hku tsun ai dai shaloi she
unit.utterance_translation: let us go to a big village" (she) said like that and at that time

unit.utterance: shi na madu wa gaw tsun ai
unit.utterance_translation: her husband said.

unit.utterance: n mai ai da
unit.utterance_translation: "It's not good," he said.

unit.utterance: ngai ngai na prat hta ngai kanau ndai langai hte sha nga wa ai
unit.utterance_translation: "I have been only with this one brother in my life."

unit.utterance: ngai n mai hka ai
unit.utterance_translation: "I cannot be separated from him."

unit.utterance: shi mung shi mung ngai hpe grai tsawra ai
unit.utterance_translation: "He also loves me very much."

unit.utterance: an nau lahkawng kaji kaw na kanu kawa ma n lu ai
unit.utterance_translation: "We brothers could not have parents from childhood."

unit.utterance: ngai shi na kawa zawn kanu zawn rai na nga taw re nga tsun ai
unit.utterance_translation: (He) said "I have been living like his parents."

unit.utterance: ora langai gaw e da nang ngai hpe grau tsawra ai i
unit.utterance_translation: The other one (said) "Yes, do you love me more?"

unit.utterance: shi hpe grau tsawra ai i dai hku bai tsun ai dai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: "Do (you) love him more?" she said like that and

unit.utterance: nang hpe mung gaw tsawra ai da
unit.utterance_translation: "(I) also love you," he said.

unit.utterance: raitim dai hku gaw hkum tsun nga na tsun ai
unit.utterance_translation: (He) said "But, don't say like that."

unit.utterance: deng gaw madu jan gaw myit yu magang she
unit.utterance_translation: Then, the wife thought and

unit.utterance: htora shi na karat mung kaba wa sai hte
unit.utterance_translation: her brother-in-law also grew up and

unit.utterance: lani hte lani kaba wa yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: (he) grew up day by day and

unit.utterance: num la ten ni du wa sai
unit.utterance_translation: he became the age to get a wife.

unit.utterance: rai yang gaw num la ten du wa yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: He became the age to get a wife and

unit.utterance: htinggaw lahkawng dai hku jawm garan sha na hpe shi gaw n ra wa sai
unit.utterance_translation: she did not like (the situation of) two families eating (foods), dividing (them) like that together.

unit.utterance: dan yang gaw shi gaw dai myit yu magang madu wa hpe tsun magang
unit.utterance_translation: Then, the more she thought it, the more (she) said to her husband.

unit.utterance: madu wa mung na grai n ji wa le i
unit.utterance_translation: Her husband also was tired (of listening to her), OK?

unit.utterance: madu jan nau tsun yang she
unit.utterance_translation: The wife said to him too much and

unit.utterance: e yau sai da ngai na kanau mung kaba wa sai nga yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: (He) said "OK, my brother has also grown up already" and

unit.utterance: shi na shi rai na sai
unit.utterance_translation: "He has to stay by himself."

unit.utterance: ndai ram nga yang mung rai na sai
unit.utterance_translation: "He is OK if he grew up like this."

unit.utterance: n chye gaw raitim anu gaw dai hku rai na tsun ai
unit.utterance_translation: "(I) don't know, but my mother said like that."

unit.utterance: ya an hkawng gaw ndai kaw nga na mi n re nga ai gaw

unit.utterance: dan jang gaw law law di tim hpa n ra ai

unit.utterance: shi na shi bai si wa na ra ai nga na tsun ai da
unit.utterance_translation: "It will bear fruits on its own," (he) said.

unit.utterance: shi na madu jan wa mung e rai nga ai nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: His wife said "Yes, it is right," and

unit.utterance: langai mi di langai mi di rai she

unit.utterance: lahkawng ngu na di ai shaloi she
unit.utterance_translation: When they took two fruits,

unit.utterance_translation: the fruit, it became a big snake at once.

unit.utterance: rai na she shan la lahkawng hpe mayu kau ai da

unit.utterance: rai na ndai hku tsun da ai nga yang gaw

unit.utterance: anhte hkrai nga yang gaw ndai
